name: Hold Fate
description: You peer into the immediate future and lock in a favorable outcome. When you cast this spell, roll a single mysticism dice and store the result. While you maintain concentration, you can use a reaction to end the spell and replace one of your own checks with your stored result.
charge: You roll your full mysticism check and take the highest dice instead of a single dice and can replace the check of any creature within a moderate (20 unit) distance instead of just yourself.
